name: Coauthorship Networks Dev Container
postCreateCommand: /bin/sh -c 'sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y graphviz && /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install virtualenv && rm -rf .venv && /usr/local/bin/python -m virtualenv .venv && .venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt'
